title: Hidamari Sketch x Hoshimittsu
alternative_title: Hidamari Sketch x ☆☆☆, ひだまりスケッチ×☆☆☆
description: Yuno has begun her new artist’s life in her new dream school, Yamabuki High School. In front of the school is an apartment complex called Hidamari-so, where she moves in and meets classmates, senior students, and other strange artists.
